<[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/]]> GoDirect Connectivity Conference
Paris Le Bourget 20 September, 2017 Dear valued customers, partners and friends, We are pleased to invite you to our GoDirect Connectivity Conference that will take place in the AC Marriot Hotel Paris Le Bourget Airport on the 20th of September 2017. Join us for the first GoDirect satellite communications oriented event hosted by Honeywell in Paris. The conference will give you a great overview and understanding of cabin connectivity products & services, latest applications, certifications, support and troubleshooting procedures as well as activation of the service and support. Previously hosted in Dubai, Shanghai, Basel, Copenhagen, Nuremberg, our GoDirect events are gaining more popularity from business jet owners and charter operators, as well as MROs. Great opportunity to have all your questions answered (feel free to submit your questions here <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/XGq009I0Z000X200002iQd0]]> beforehand) and to network. Latest inflight connectivity updates | Ka-Band | Ku-Band | Swiftbroadband | SBB-Safety | Flight Support Services | Hardware and Software updates | New applications and service demonstrations | You can download full agenda here <[[https://pages3.honeywell.com/rs/641-QIX-912/images/Honeywell%20GoDirect%20Connectivity%20Event%20Paris%20LBG.pdf]]>. You can confirm your attendance directly to Sylwia.Bodzon@Honeywell.com <[[http://goaero.honeywell.com/dG0q0ieZ200X000I0a020Q0]]> or register using the form below:
CLICK HERE TO RSVP <[[https://aerospace.honeywell.com/en/events-listing/2017/september/godirect-connectivity-conference-paris]]>
